list.name: Default
list.comment: *Created ism.ccm_extinct to calculate CCM extinction at arbitrary wavelengths. *Added Ha, Hb as 'filters' to ccm_filters *Changed mods_linelist.dat names to note forbidden lines ("[NII]"). *Added zorder keyword to abs.plotzero,plotaxes. Defaults to zorder=0.

task.summary: Added interaction with linetools code, including pulling from IDL: find_fvals, solarabundance. Created get_line for easy access to linetools LineList properties.
*Created ISM package to include all of the ISM modules [as functions in ism.py] *Moved lsrvel to ISM package. *Created abs package to hold absorption line tools [incl. sensitivity calculations]
*simple_coadd combines files with same starting wavelength (to 1 Ang)
*v1.0 of uves.full_coadd() *full_coadd: Replaced err=0 points with nan *full_coadd: use the grow_bad_sig option for XSpectrum1D.rebin()
*Added airtovac conversion for UVES spectra (by default; user option)
*MODS module now joins blue/red spectra through join_mods1d.

*Created ism.wham module *wham.get_spectrum – grab an invidual WHAM spec *wham.get_intensity - The Ha intensity from WHAM's regularly-gridded data *ism/data/wham-ss... -The WHAM Sky Survey data, released 03/2017.

*Added flux integration to HII. *Added 2% flux uncertainty across the board. This is appropriate for flux calibration standards. *fit_flux_free -- This works as advertised. *fit_flux -- The Sherpa fitting still causes issues.

*Fixed issue with trying to access GaussianEmission parameters incorrectly. *Reset stddev bounds to 1-3 Ang. *Added formatting to output table. *fit_lines: added more functions for tying line redshifts, sigma. *Several function name changes: * get_lines > get_linelist; * fit_flux > fit_lines_sherpa; * fit_flux_free > fit_lines *Added functions

MESSAGE.value: Added interaction with linetools code, including pulling from IDL: find_fvals, solarabundance. Created get_line for easy access to linetools LineList properties.
*Created ISM package to include all of the ISM modules [as functions in ism.py] *Moved lsrvel to ISM package. *Created abs package to hold absorption line tools [incl. sensitivity calculations]
*simple_coadd combines files with same starting wavelength (to 1 Ang)
*v1.0 of uves.full_coadd() *full_coadd: Replaced err=0 points with nan *full_coadd: use the grow_bad_sig option for XSpectrum1D.rebin()
*Added airtovac conversion for UVES spectra (by default; user option)
*MODS module now joins blue/red spectra through join_mods1d.

*Created ism.wham module *wham.get_spectrum – grab an invidual WHAM spec *wham.get_intensity - The Ha intensity from WHAM's regularly-gridded data *ism/data/wham-ss... -The WHAM Sky Survey data, released 03/2017.

*Added flux integration to HII. *Added 2% flux uncertainty across the board. This is appropriate for flux calibration standards. *fit_flux_free -- This works as advertised. *fit_flux -- The Sherpa fitting still causes issues.

*Fixed issue with trying to access GaussianEmission parameters incorrectly. *Reset stddev bounds to 1-3 Ang. *Added formatting to output table. *fit_lines: added more functions for tying line redshifts, sigma. *Several function name changes: * get_lines > get_linelist; * fit_flux > fit_lines_sherpa; * fit_flux_free > fit_lines *Added functions

*Created ism.ccm_extinct to calculate CCM extinction at arbitrary wavelengths. *Added Ha, Hb as 'filters' to ccm_filters *Changed mods_linelist.dat names to note forbidden lines ("[NII]"). *Added zorder keyword to abs.plotzero,plotaxes. Defaults to zorder=0.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: *Created ism.ccm_extinct to calculate CCM extinction at arbitrary wavelengths. *Added Ha, Hb as 'filters' to ccm_filters *Changed mods_linelist.dat names to note forbidden lines ("[NII]"). *Added zorder keyword to abs.plotzero,plotaxes. Defaults to zorder=0.
